Package io.permazen.encoding

Class ShortArrayEncoding

java.lang.Object
io.permazen.encoding.AbstractEncoding<T>
io.permazen.encoding.ArrayEncoding<T,E>
io.permazen.encoding.Base64ArrayEncoding<T,E>
io.permazen.encoding.IntegralArrayEncoding<short[],Short>
io.permazen.encoding.ShortArrayEncoding
All Implemented Interfaces:
Encoding<short[]>, NaturalSortAware, Serializable, Comparator<short[]>
public class ShortArrayEncoding extends IntegralArrayEncoding<short[],Short>
short[] primitive array type. Does not support null arrays.
See Also:
